status.text: once you kill a cow, you gotta make a burger
TONIGHT is The World Premiere of "Telephone: starring Lady Gaga and Beyonce" on E!News at 11:30pm EST 8:30 Pacific. R they ready, Honey B?
Listening to The Edge. Catch me if you can kiwis. I'm in a walka. Play telephone?x
Just arrived in New Zealand, greeted at 7 am by all my beautiful fans, glitter faces + police. Can't wait to perform the show of a lifetime.
Its a town full of losers, and I'm pulling out of here to win
Fans outside the house screaming "telephone or die." Kind of amazing
Monsieur La Padite. To both your family and your cows, I say, BRAVO.
Isn't it interesting how one singing voice is (while subjective), either good or bad. But a CROWD of people singing, ALWAYS sounds beautiful
Love u little monsters miss u terrible champagne and orange squeeze. Its five o'clock somewhere

LITTLE MONSTERS!! Today is an exciting day. Telephone become our SIXTH NUMBER 1 RECORD IN A ROW IN AMERICA! I love you so much! Celebrate!
Its so silly,I do these interviews, + they say Gaga "arent u sick of the life," I think to myself, if they only knew how much I love my fans
So, Night roomies. xx i love you.
since im living nowhere right now and live on the road with my props+wigs.(which is everything I own)i suppose my fans, in a way, livewithme
Glasgow was so amazing, serious liberation tonight. I think it set ME free.
feel better sweetheart , i love you.
I can hear u, I think I might need a little extra eyeliner for Scotland. Ye buncha pissheads.
Telephone is coming I promise! Still editing. I want it to be perfect. The Haus has dubbed her a "masterpiece."
What a fucking night. Sweating, pumping, dancing, mental human beings my fans are. Paws for miles and liquor. Freedom! Ill never leave u,
Celebrate! Rejoice 2nite little monsters! The album you believed in #THE FAME is officially DIAMOND CERTIFIED WORLDWIDE! 10,000,054 copies!
2 sold out O2 arenas in london, I'm so excited to see my little monster 2nite they may need to have a stretcher ready for me. I can't wait!
Any scousers gotta video of "the living dress" so happy I could die ? tweet me! The Haus is celebrating we want to see it from your POV!
Watch very closely as the magical angel and I are swallowed by the rainbow twister, and left stranded on the Glitter Way.
2nite Haus of Gaga debuts "the living dress" inspired by Hussein Chalayan, as a fashion moment to be performed in "pop show" at Monsterball.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zkONsZsFmHk one of the most memorable performances I've been a part of. A truly magnificent evening.

Tonight's performance is inspired by our friend. Mask by Phillip Treacy, Sculpture by Nick Knight, Music by Lady Gaga. We miss you.

Check my out on the Today Show with cyndi! #vivaglam little monsters!
Watch Good Morning America! Talking about #vivaglam campaign with @shebop_aka_cyn , my partner Cyndi Lauper. Help raise HIV/AIDS awareness x
My fans are waiting in the blizzard at 5 am in new york. I love u!
basically if you mix this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yONQjYs6cHU Death metal with ice dancing + high fashion you get the Monsterball
rub that glitter + grease around, can't wait for you to see the new show little monsters!
Its the year of the underdog!
Yeaaah!!!! Motherfuckers!!!!
Pinball wizard!!!!
Hair bleach makes for a brilliant morning. On way to rehearsal for world tour. Strapping on my leather boots, time to dance for my life.
http://twitpic.com/11firi - beautiful photo taken of me the moment I found out i won my grammys. All the hundreds of songs I wrote, the thou
www.projectmedishare.com is a Haitian organization that is non-celebrity related group where all monies donated go directly to the streets
We're donating every dollar of proceeds from "Gaga for Haiti," over half a million dollars to PROJECT MEDISHARE, a Haiti based organization
http://twitpic.com/112xya - chola tattoo from shamrock, so proud.
http://twitpic.com/112xya - look what i did last night. little monsters forever, on the arm that holds my mic. xx

@perezhilton i can't sleep, your hat was major last night. it needs to be archived.x

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Igkv1WB0I-0 what a night, my favorite performance we've ever done. piano created by dear friend Terence Koh
We won big tonight little monsters,I am so proud to make music 4 you.I hope I continue to inspire u the way u inspire me.You're everything.
I am so grateful to all of you for your loyalty and love. I would never be here without u. #littlemonstersforever
We won two grammy's already little monsters + I dedicate them to u! I ruined my makeup crying! Look for little monster suprise on the piano
Backstage getting ready, feels like youre here with me tonight little monsters. Thank you for a beautiful year full of love and music.Iloveu
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kd4x-_iL85s reminiscing about the beginning. i directed this almost 2 years ago with the haus of gaga. love.
Thank u for creating #nationalladygagaday little monsters! I love u with all my gaga heart. On the set,I feel bad for the bad romance video
K-kinda busy
At the end of the day,when the lights are off + no one's looking, its the power of rehearsal that reminds me i'm a fighter. 5 days monsters
long day of rehearsals. leather on my boots still sweating, time to give purdue what they long deserve. 2nite is the last of US monsterball
http://fashionindie.com/random-lady-gaga-cookies/ this is so amazing. i'm laughing so hard, i think just peed a little my fans are the best
go to www.ladygaga.com all merch purchased funds relief in Haiti. ALL 100% PERCENT. On way to Radio City, can't wait to see my lil monsters.
#gagaforhaiti
#gagaforhaiti all money goes to haitirelief Wear gaga merch, and let the world know u helped haiti. www.ladygaga.com.

warming up for the show. i can hear u screaming from my dressing room. slutty little monsters
The team of doctors and nurses who saved my dads life came to the monsterball, one of the best nights of my life performing for u.Rejoice NY
what a show last night, my little monsters are everything.thinking its time to get a little monster tattoo.thoughts? headed to rehearsal
Back in New York, leopard tights and sparkles, like a new woman. Can't wait 4 Monster Ball, ready to tear the face off my hometown 2nite xx
Little monsters attending the Monsterball on the 24th: all ticket + and merch/cd profit will be donated. Save your money. Help save a life.
Monies will be donated immediately, spread the word around the world so we can raise as much money as possible.
Jan 24th is GAGA FOR HELPING HAITI day. Go to www.ladygaga.com on the 24th + 100% of all merchandise purchased goes to earthquake relief
I hope you can forgive me. I love my little monsters more than anything, you are everything to me. I will make-up the performance on Jan 26.
I am so devastated. I have performed with the flu, a cold, strep throat: I would never cancel a show just based on discomfort.
My stage has complicated mechanical elements,everyone was concerned I'd be in danger during the 2hr show, since I had passed out earlier.
can't apologize enough for how sorry I am. I could hear my fans cheering from my dressing room, I begged everyone to let me go onstage.
Paramedics came to take care of me, and told me my heart-rate was irregular-- a result of exhaustion and dehydration.
I've been crying for hours, I feel like I let my fans down 2nite. An hour before the show, I was feeling dizzy and having trouble breathing
pretty genius, big huge man banging on the car window outside the arena, trying to sell me scalped tickets to my own show. yoouuu skalliwag
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WEpj9w1yz64 holy shit
Just spent the morning at kuma's, judas priest burger and cheap beer, denim +leather, brought us all together.
http://twitpic.com/x5vuz -
time to drink a bottle of wine and sketch for the new tour. st.louis was brilliant. there's eyeliner on my knee, and blood on my elbow.shady
thank you to all my fans for voting for me! we won 2 people's choice awards little monsters!
The monsterball was moved so we could still perform, not to sell more tickets. I promise to make it up to you, you are everything to mexgaga
A serious error was made by my production staff, and it is so unfair to you, who are so loyal.My show was not designed to fit in this venue
To my little monsters, I am so sick over the 2 venues that were moved for Monsterball,and am sincerely sorry to all my fans who lost seats
On the 5th day of the new decade, Bad Romance became my fifth US #1 record! Little monsters free yourselves and celebrate! I love u baby
Most amazing online vintage store ever. Checkout http://store03.prostores.com/consume ..Its lady starlight's store. Little monster heaven.
billy joel
"we drown our doubts, in fine champagne, and sooth our souls with fine cocaine. i don't know why i even care. we get so high + get nowhere."
Hmmmmm...I wonder if ill score tonight
To my little monsters! May your only pains in 2010 be champagnes! I love u. New years resolution: to enjoy life/warhol electroblond xgagaloo
Two shows, about 13 outfits, 15,000 little monsters, and sticky champagne, and I don't care if its miami I'm still wearing leather
